meanings.definition: A trace or evidence of something that once existed or was present.
meanings.sent1: The old ruins showed clear vestiges of the ancient civilization.
meanings.sent2: She found vestiges of her childhood in the attic while cleaning.
meanings.sent3: The detective followed the vestiges of footprints to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent4: In the abandoned house, only vestiges of furniture remained.
meanings.sent5: The fading painting revealed hidden vestiges of a forgotten artist.

meanings.definition: A small amount or remnant of something larger or more substantial.
meanings.sent1: There were only vestiges of food left in the fridge after the party.
meanings.sent2: The old book had vestiges of the author's notes in the margins.
meanings.sent3: The chef added vestiges of spices to enhance the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent4: The garden displayed vestiges of colorful flowers from the previous season.
meanings.sent5: The dusty attic held vestiges of memories long forgotten.
